taskbody.context: Follow these steps to add a Windows device using local authentication, through the interface. To monitor other environments, see .

step.cmd: In the left column, select the /Server/Microsoft/Windows class, and then click DETAILS.
Select Configuration Properties, and then provide values for the zWinRMUser and zWinRMPassword properties.
In the left column, click SEE ALL.
From the the Add menu, select Add a Single Device.
Complete the form with the information for the Windows device to add.
step.info: The value of the Name or IP field must be resolvable and accessible from the collector host specified in the Collector field.
